sentences: Eesti venelased on Eestis elavad inimesed vene päritolu.
Venemaa Föderatsiooni suurim rahvas on venelased.
context: Venelejad is the plural form of 'venelane' meaning Russian person or Russian people. It refers to citizens or residents of Russia, particularly those of Russian ethnicity. The word comes from 'vene' (Russian) and the suffix '-lane/-lased' which indicates people of a certain nationality or origin. Estonian venelased would specifically mean Russians living in Estonia.
